tool_description: Validates and standardizes incoming emergency call data, ensuring required information is present and properly formatted for downstream processing.

call_type.description: Type of emergency: medical, fire, police, multi-agency

incident_description.description: Detailed description of the emergency incident

error_messages: Invalid phone number format: Provide a valid 10-digit phone number
Unsupported call type: Use medical, fire, police, or multi-agency
Missing incident description: Provide a detailed description of at least 10 characters
Invalid location format: Provide a complete street address or recognizable landmark
Invalid patient count: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 100
usage: Input raw emergency call data to validate and standardize all required fields before processing.

call_id.description: Unique identifier generated for this call

validation_status.description: Status of validation: valid or requires_followup
